attributes.action: Ban the use of abbreviated bird names or 'esoteric' nicknames such as "Sprosser" and "Icky"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many birders use names like "Sprosser", "Icky", "Melody" and so on to try and sound cool. It's not big and it's not clever. It's stupid. Therefore anybody caught using these names should be fined, birched or imprisoned. Or all three.

rejection.details: This petition has no point about Government policy.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
